tiers.label: Street Level
tiers.description: Characters with the strength to harm or defeat regular humans and wild animals. Typical of early slice-of-life or school-based worlds.

tiers.label: Athletic Level
tiers.description: Characters capable of peak human feats. Often from grounded action or martial arts worlds.

tiers.label: Enhanced Human
tiers.description: Characters with physical enhancements like cybernetics, ki, or low-level magic. May include minor superpowers.

tiers.label: Wall Level
tiers.description: Can destroy or withstand attacks capable of breaking through walls. First-level supernatural battles.

tiers.label: Omniversal
tiers.description: Beyond all comprehension, able to affect the multiverse or transcend existence. Highest conceptual tier.
